title: AI Helper
defaultGreeting: Hi! I'm your AI helper. Ask me anything about the platform or choose a question below.
contextGreeting: Hi! I'm your AI helper for {{context}}. Ask me anything or choose a question below.
errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

chat.title: Chat Help
chat.description: You're in the chat interface. Here you can have conversations with AI agents, upload files, and use various tools.

agents.title: Agents Help
agents.description: You're viewing the agents page. Here you can create, edit, and manage your custom AI agents.

stage.title: Stage Help
stage.description: You're in the Stage builder. Here you can create multi-agent workflows by connecting agents and functions.

canvas.title: Canvas Help
canvas.description: You're in the Canvas view. Here you can create visual diagrams and flowcharts.

marketplace.title: Marketplace Help
marketplace.description: You're browsing the marketplace. Here you can discover and use community-created agents and workflows.

default.title: General Help
default.description: I can help you navigate Albert and answer questions about its features.
